Notice Claimants Receive in VA Form 21-526EZ
VA Form 21-526EZ
provides claimants with the notice
38 U.S.C. 5103
requires for the following types of disability compensation claims:
service connection (SC) for disabilities related to the following types of service:
active duty
active duty for training, or
inactive duty training
secondary SC
increased disability compensation
compensation claims submitted prior to discharge
individual unemployability
temporary total disability rating due to
hospitalization, or
surgical or other treatment
compensation under
38 U.S.C. 1151
special monthly compensation based on the
need for aid and attendance (A&A), or
status of being housebound
additional benefits for a spouse who needs A&A
specially adapted housing or special home adaptation
automobile allowance or adaptive equipment, and
additional compensation for a Veteran with a child incapable of self-support.
Exception
:  Certain special issue claims require additional notification as outlined in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.B.1.e
.  In these cases, follow the procedures outlined in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 2.B.3
, for providing a subsequent development letter.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information About the Fully Developed Claim (FDC) Program
